name: ProvoCityGuide
0:
”Alexa, ask Provo Guide about Provo”
”Alexa, ask Provo Guide for breakfast recommendations”
”Alexa, ask Provo Guide for things to do in Provo”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: provo guide
des: If you're a local looking for some fresh suggestions or just visiting Provo, enable the Provo City Guide to help you with some suggestions for things to do around town. Ask Alexa to suggest places to eat for breakfast, lunch, or dinner. If you're looking for something to do, she can help you with some of Provo's biggest attractions to check out. Made and tested by a local!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
